detailsData.title: Decades of Experience
detailsData.content: William D. Shapiro Law, Inc. has been advocating for injured victims throughout Southern California for more than four decades, recovering hundreds of millions of dollars for their clients.

detailsData.title: Contingency Fee Basis
detailsData.content: The firm represents injured victims on a contingency fee basis, meaning clients don't pay unless the firm recovers on their behalf.

detailsData.title: Seasoned Advocacy
detailsData.content: Founder William D. Shapiro is a California Bar Certified Civil Trial Specialist, providing clients with confidence, a strong voice, and seasoned advocacy.

address: 893 East Brier Dr. San Bernardino, CA 92408
